title: So, is there no way to earn chaos tokens anymore?
body: Like do i just spend them now or will there be more missions?

replies.body: Now that the [**VS Event has ended**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017), there aren't any more ways to get Chaos tokens. Missions should be coming back around relatively soon to help bring in new events and content!
I was wondering the same thing o.O{{summoner:3}}
